DOC.brief_summary: This trial is an observational study about combination antifungal therapy in hematologic patients with proven and probable invasive fungal infections (IFI).
DOC.brief_title: Seifem Surveillance of Antifungal Combination Therapy In Hematologic Italian Centers
DOC.criteria: Haematologic patients with proven or probable IFI Therapy with a combination of antifungal drugs Haematologic patients with possible IFI
